phrs.translation: 战人, 右代宫战人, 圣斗士, 贫苦人
圣战士丹拜因, 圣兵士丹拜因, 士丹拜因
食物大战, 食品大战
高达卡牌对战, 高达卡牌战斗, 高达卡片战斗者

sentences.sentence: Cool on the ball, skilful and a real battler.
sentences.translation: 冷静，细腻，一位真的勇士。

sentences.sentence: He brought the crusty old battler word from Roosevelt that it was time to quit.
sentences.translation: 他从罗斯福那带去了那句执拗的陈旧的战斗口号：是认输的时候了。

sentences.sentence: The battler describes a battler who wants to win money as well as to keep his reputation.
sentences.translation: 《拳击手》描写了一个想赢钱可又死要面子的拳击手。
